segments.text: Hey Sarah , I'm having some trouble finding an apartment . Can you help me look at some listings online ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . What kind of apartment are you looking for ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , it has to be cheap . I don't want a really expensive apartment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Would you like to live in a studio ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , a studio would be fine .
segments.speaker: S1
